trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Black Rock
There were no other sightings in Black Rock on or around March 8th 2008
Summary: Saw a triangle shaped craft hovering, then went forward, turned 90 degrees and shot upwards
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsOn March the Eighth I was driving from between Smithville, AR to Cherokee Village, AR and was going towards Imboden at around 9:30 pm on Hwy 115. I turned a corner and saw the object hovering at what was just a little above my eyeline. I guess I just slammed on my breaks and my car died (I have a standard, so I might not have pressed the clutch. I don't remember if I did or not) and couldn't do anything but stare at it. To say I was shocked is an understatement. I was also a little scared, but also a little in awe of it. It had lights around the edges that showed it to be triangle like. I think it was only a couple of minutes that it hovered before moving to my left, then turning sharply and shooting upwards and disapeared.
